headline: Closing Bell Movers: Snap falls 14% after Q1 results, no guidance
summary: In the opening 90 minutes of the evening session, U.S. equity futures are softer – Dow Industrials are flat, but S&P 500 is off by 0.2% and Nasdaq 100 is down 0.4%. In energy, WTI crude oil is extending Tuesday’s decline toward the $60 per barrel level after the largest build in API crude stocks data in four weeks. In metals, Gold is slightly lower below $3,330 per ounce. A busy afterhours earnings session saw a mixed picture in the Semiconductors and Tech space. Seagate jumped 9% on earnings be

headline: Booking Holdings sees Q2 revenue up 10%-12%
summary: Sees Q2 adjusted EBITDA $2.15B-$2.2B. Sees Q2 room night growth 4%-6%. Sees Q2 gross bookings up 10%-12%. Says saw evidence of bifurcated economy in the U.S. Says has seen stable travel demand trends at start of Q2. Says closely monitoring environment for changes. Comments and guidance taken from Q1 earnings conference call. Published first on TheFly – the ultimate source for real-time, market-moving breaking financial news. headline: Why Analysts Expect Booking Holdings To Withstand Worries About US Travel Demand
summary: Booking Holdings widened its full-year outlook amid concerns about U.S. travel demand, but analysts say the company's international operations should help counter a decline in U.S. travel bookings.

headline: Booking Q1 beats estimates as global travel offsets US weakness
summary: Booking Holdings (BKNG) beat earnings and revenue expectations in the first quarter as strong international demand offset softer US travel demand. Booking Holdings executive vice president and CFO Ewout Steenbergen joins Catalysts to discuss how global diversification is helping the travel booking company navigate economic uncertainty and consumer pressures. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Catalysts here.

headline: Priceline's New AI-Powered Neighborhood Edition is First to Match Travelers' Preferences and Vibes with Unique Destination Recommendations
summary: Get ready to explore the world like never before! Priceline, the genAI-powered travel innovator, is introducing its Spring 2025 product release, Trip Intelligence: The Neighborhood Edition. Priceline's new neighborhood features enable users to discover unique locations that match their personal "vibe," interests, and passions, all while unlocking Priceline's unbeatable deals.

headline: Agoda Unveils Top 5 Cities for a Memorable Motel Stay in South Korea
summary: Digital travel platform Agoda has revealed the top five cities in South Korea where travelers are flocking to enjoy the unique charm of motel stays. Based on booking data from January to March this year, Seoul, Busan, Jeju, Incheon, and Daegu have emerged as the most popular destinations for those seeking a cozy and convenient lodging experience.
